headline: APA Corp. (APA) Sheds 7.9% as Oil Prices Stabilize
summary: APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA) is one of the These 10 Stocks Took A Shocking Fall. APA Corporation fell for a third day on Monday, shedding 7.91 percent to finish at $18.39 apiece following the drop in oil prices, thanks to the ceasefire between Israel and Iran. APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA), an energy exploration and production company, dropped […]
